attributes.action: Ban all Halal and Kosher Ritual slaughter of animals
attributes.additional_details: Ban any ritual animal slaughter and jail anybody breaking this law
attributes.background: We want Halal and Kosher ritual animal slaughter banned,This is a civilised society and inhumane slaughter for religious beliefs born outside of the United Kingdom is disgusting

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614742
